profile.title: Fayɛl (User Profile)
profile.mustLogin: Ɛsɛ sɛ wokɔ mu ansa na wuhu nhyehyɛe no.
profile.autoTranslate: Kɔsɛ kɔsɛ kɔkyerɛ ase ntɛm ara
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Kyerɛ nea wɔkaa kan ne n’akyerɛase
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Kyerɛ deɛ wɔkae kan ne n’akyerɛase ɛkɔ mu
profile.enableReadReceipts: Kyerɛ sɛ wɔakan me asɛmmisa (read receipt)
profile.allowExplicitContent: Ma asɛm brɔbrɔ no tumi ba
profile.disappearingMessages: Ma nsɛm no nyerae wɔ bere tiaa mu
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Nsɛnimuka ansa na wɔpopa no kɔ
profile.noPrivateKey: Sɛkrɛt safoa biara nni saa afidie yi so a wobɛtumi asie.
profile.setBackupPassword: Fa password hyɛ mu na ɛbɛkora wo backup no mu:
profile.backupDownloaded: Backup a wɔabɔ ho ban no atwe aba ha.
profile.exportFailed: Safoa no antumi amfi ha kɔ (export) mu
profile.enterBackupPassword: Kyerɛ password a ɛwɔ saa backup yi mu:
profile.importSuccess: Wode wo safoa kookurokoo aba saa afidie yi so.
profile.importFailed: Safoa no antumi amfa (password dii mfomso anaa fael no nni mfaso).
profile.keysRotated: Wɔayɛ wo safoa foforo na wɔde wo public key kɔe.
profile.importKey: Fa backup a wɔabɔ ho ban bra (import)
profile.keyDisclaimer: Wo safoa kookurokoo no nfi saa afidie yi so. Twe (export) deɛ wɔde bɔ ho password na wubetumi asan de aba afidie foforo so bio.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Woyɛ Free—fa Owia/Osram (Sun/Moon) no ntɛmntɛm wɔ ha. Sɔ kɔ Premium na nya theme pii.
profile.backupTitle: Backup a wɔabɔ ho ban & Afidie Sync
profile.backupDesc: Bɔ wo safoa ho ban wɔ password mu na si sie. Afei san fa (restore) no bra afidie foforo so na yɛ sync.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Brɛ nsɛm no dɔm bere a app no nyɛ active
profile.notifyOnCopy: Ka me kyerɛ sɛ obi copye me asɛm
profile.followHint: Ne status/beats bɛda wo Following mu sɛ ɔde bɛto Followers (anaa Public).
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Ade bi ankɔ yie wɔ beae yi.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Ma nkɔmbɔfrɛ ne nkratoɔ a wɔrebɛba no nkɔ wo fon a woadi akode anaa wo email. Sɛ worefrɛ/woretwerɛ afi ha a, wɔn bɛhunu wo Chatforia nɔma.
profile.forwardTextsToPhone: Ma nkratoɔ no nkɔ me fon so
profile.forwardTextsToEmail: Ma nkratoɔ no nkɔ me email
profile.destinationPhoneForCalls: Fon nɔma a frɛ no nkɔ so (E.164)
profile.quietHoursOptional: Bere a wonnfrɛ me (Quiet Hours) (ɛyɛ kama na wode bɛhyɛ)
profile.reset: San hyɛ no te sɛ kan

chat.selectPrompt: Paw asɛm bi anaa chat room bi na fi ase nkasa
chat.emptySubtitle: Twerɛ asɛmmisa na fi asɛm mu.

sidebar.loginPrompt: Kɔ mu na sesa wo nhyehyɛe.

premium.heading: Kɔ Premium
premium.description: Gye tumi mmɔdenfo nneɛma na yi adwumadi (ads) nyinaa.

auth.headline: Banbɔ mu asɛmkɔkɔɔ a ɛkasa wo kasa ntɛm ara
auth.description: End-to-end banbɔ (encryption), AI nkyerɛase ntɛm ara, nsɛm a ɛyera, ne frɛ/mfonini kasa.

feature.translation: Kɔkyerɛ ase kɔkɔɔ kasa 100+ mu ntɛm ara
feature.disappearing: Nsɛm a ɛyera ne read receipt
feature.privacy: Sikasɛm-fĩ di kan. Wo data yɛ wo dea.

auth.desktopTip: Wɔ kɔmputa so? Fa wo fon scan na nya app no.
auth.subhead: Asɛm a wɔde abɔ ho ban, atwere mu asɛm, ne nkyerɛase ntɛm ara — kɛse biara nni mu.
auth.tip: Wubetumi de Chatforia yɛ adwuma wɔ afidie biara so — na sɛ wotwe app no a ɛyɛ asɛmpa koraa.
auth.openDownload: Bue krataa a wobɛtwe fi so (download page)
auth.scanHint: Scan na twe app no anaa bue wɔ wo brawsa mu.

home.title: Fie
home.subheader: Twerɛ asɛmmisa na fi nkɔmmɔ ase.

press.title: Press
press.contact: Sɛ wopɛ asɛm ama media a, frɛ yɛn wɔ press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Sɛ wopɛ asɛm ama media a, frɛ yɛn wɔ press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia yɛ asɛmkɔkɔɔ a ɛwɔ banbɔ mu a ɛde nkyerɛase ntɛm ara ne E2E banbɔ (encryption) baabiara, ma ɛyɛ mmerante ne mmea a wɔwɔ wiase nyinaa ho mmerɛw sɛ wobenya ne ho ne ho akasa fa asɛm a wɔn ara pɛ ho.
press.assetsText: Logo, screenshots, ne mfonini a ɛkyerɛ pɔgrame no (reba ntɛm).

careers.title: Adwuma (Careers)
careers.intro: Yɛ yɛn ketewa team. Yɛreyɛ asɛmkɔkɔɔ a ɛwɔ banbɔ mu, a obiara betumi de ayɛ adwuma wɔ wiase nyinaa. Sɛ banbɔ, ahoɔden (Accessibility), ne adeyɛ dɛ (UX) yɛ wo deɛ a, yɛpɛ wo.
careers.openRoles: Adwuma a ɛwɔ hɔ: Engineering (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Product, Support.
careers.apply: Sɛ wopɛ adwuma no: Fa wo resume/anɔpa (links) brɛ yɛn wɔ jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Fa Chatforia ho
about.description: Chatforia yɛ asɛmkɔkɔɔ a ɛwɔ banbɔ mu a ɛka kasa bebree; ɛde end-to-end banbɔ (encryption), nkyerɛase ntɛm ara, ne frɛ/video ba mu. Yɛbotae tenten ne sɛ: ma nnipa nyinaa nkasa — wɔban mu, wɔhome mu, na kasa biara nsi wɔn ntam.

values.access: Kɔ so ma obiara: Nkyerɛase kɔkɔɔ kasa 100+ mu.
values.control: Wo na wowura so: Nsɛm a ɛyera ne read receipt yɛ nea wopɛ.

about.howTitle: Ɛyɛ dɛn na Chatforia di dwuma
about.howDescription: Wɔde wo nsɛm bɔ ho ban wɔ wo afidie so ansa na wɔmfa kɔ baabia. Nkyerɛase, backup, ne afidie-sync no yɛ adwuma sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛn server renhu woade pii.

advertise.title: Bɔ dawuru wɔ Chatforia so
advertise.description: Kɔpɛ nnipa a wɔde asɛmkɔkɔɔ yɛ adwuma daa, na kyerɛ wo brand no fɛfɛɛfɛ. Yɛwɔ bannaa beae (banner), sponsorships, ne yɛ ankasa promo. Sikafo a wɔwɔ Premium renhunu adwumadi (ads).

adsense.withPubId: Seesei yɛde Google AdSense na yɛma adwumadi ba. Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wode Google Ads kɔ yɛn so a, fa publisher ID {{pubId}} na bisa managed placement wɔ units a ɛwɔ ase ha. Sponsorship kɛse nso wɔ hɔ — fa form no fa brɛ yɛn.
adsense.noPubId: Seesei yɛde Google AdSense na yɛma adwumadi ba. Sponsorship kɛse nso wɔ hɔ — fa form no fa brɛ yɛn daabiara.

advertise.noPlacements: Beae biara nnhyehyɛɛ. Fa ka ho wɔ ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Nnipa kɔ baako so bebree na wɔtena mu akɔ akyiri wɔ chat mu
why.brandSafe: Ɛyɛ brand-safe; yɛnhyɛ wo so adwumadi pii
why.sponsoredMoments: Yɛwɔ bere a wobɛtumi asponsoa (sɛ 'Fi Nkɔmmɔ' pop-up no)
why.deals: Direct deals anaa Google Ads/AdSense so

form.submittedMsg: Meda wo ase! Yɛanya wo asɛmmisa. Yɛbɛsan aba ntɛm.
form.missingRequired: Fa wo din, email, ne asɛmmisa hyɛ mu ansa.
form.successToast: Meda wo ase! Yɛbɛka wo ho ntɛm.
form.mailtoInfo: Rebue wo email app na ɛde asɛmmisa no akɔ…
form.budgetLabel: Sika a wobɛtow gu so bosome biara (pɛ)
form.messagePlaceholder: Deɛn na wopɛ, bere bɛn, sika bɛn, beae a wobɛpɛ…

legal.disclaimerStart: Sɛ wode yɛn krataa yi brɛ yɛn a, wopene so kyerɛ sɛ wote yɛn

upgrade.title: Sɔ kɔ (Upgrade)
upgrade.subtitle: Fa nhyehyɛe a ɛfata wo: Yi adwumadi (ads) koraa fi Plus mu anaa nya tumi kɛse nyinaa wɔ Premium mu.

features.aiBasic: AI mmuae a ɛtɔ so kakra
AI mmuae a ɛtɔ so kakra

features.ringtones: Wo ara wopaw wo ring tone ne asɛmpae mmɔden
features.priorityUpdates: Ntosoɔ a ɛkɔ ntɛm ma wo

features.sameFeatures: Nneɛma pɛpɛɛpɛ te sɛ Bosome mu no

gettingStarted.title: Fi ase
gettingStarted.subtitle: Woyɛ foforo wɔ Chatforia? Krataa yi bɛma wo ahu nea ehia na woatumi atwitwa bere.

alert.text: Yɛbɛto so de nneɛma foforo ka ho bere a yɛde nneɛma foforo rebɛto so. Sɛ biribi nni hɔ a, kɔ

section1.title: 1) Yɛ wo akawunt
section1.loginText: fa wo akawunt a wowɔ dedaw mu.

section2.title: 2) Fi nkɔmmɔ ase
section2.item1: Yɛ DM anaa Group na twerɛ wo asɛm a edi kan.
section2.item2: Fa nkyerɛase ntɛm ara no na kasa akyirikyiri kasa 100+ mu.
section2.item3: Sɔ nsɛm a ɛyera ne read receipt wɔ Profile → Privacy mu.

section3.title: 3) Kɔ so
section3.item1Part2: krataafa no (Plus = tumi nkɔmmɔ a ɛnni adwumadi, Premium = tumi nyinaa).
section3.item2Part1: Fa afidie foforo ka ho na hyɛ backups a wɔabɔ ho ban wɔ

account.q: Ɛyɛ dɛn na mɛbɛyɛ akawunt anaa asan anya me akawunt?
account.a: Twe app no anaa fa web so, kɔ “Yɛ akawunt”, na kyerɛ wo email/fon. Sɛ woresan pɛ deɛ na wo werɛ afi a, fa “Wo werɛ afi password no?” so.

privacy.q: Asɛm no wɔ banbɔ (end-to-end encryption) mu anaa?
privacy.a: Yiw. Nsɛm ne frɛ nyinaa wɔ end-to-end banbɔ mu defɔlt. Wo ne obi a woka no nko na mote no.

translate.q: Nkyerɛase ntɛm ara no yɛ dɛn di dwuma?
translate.a: Fa “Auto-translate” to so wɔ Settings → Appearance & Language mu. Sɛ ɛbɛtumi aye a, yɛde wo afidie ara na yɛkyerɛ ase. Sɛ ɛnyɛ yi a, yɛfa banbɔ so API a ɛkɔ no mu na yɛde metadata ketewa kɔ.

contact.a: Fa email brɛ yɛn wɔ support@chatforia.com. Fa screenshot ne wo app version ka ho.

contact.title: Frɛ Yɛn
contact.successMsg: Meda wo ase — yɛbɛsan afrɛ wo wɔ email mu.
contact.errorSend: Yennyae tumi manane. Fa email brɛ yɛn wɔ support@chatforia.com.

privacyPolicy.title: Sikasɛm-fĩ (Privacy Policy)
privacyPolicy.lastUpdated: Wɔto so a etwa toɔ kɔtɔ so:

intro.body: Krataa yi kyerɛ sɛnea Chatforia (“yɛn”, “yɛ”) boaboa infɔmehyɛn ano, de di dwuma, na fa kyɛ bere a wokɔ so de yɛn app ne yɛn dwumadie di dwuma. Yɛde yɛn ho bɔ yɛn ho ban na ɛnnyɛ mmerɛw ma yɛahu wo data.

infoWeCollect.title: Infɔmehyɛn a yɛkɔboa
infoWeCollect.account: Akawunt infɔ (te sɛ email/fon) de yɛ wo akawunt na yɛbɔ ho ban.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Asɛm a wɔabɔ ho ban (nsɛm/frɛ) wɔ end-to-end banbɔ mu; yɛn nsa nte so.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Diagnostic / dwumadie infɔ te sɛ crash logs, afidie type, anaa nsɛnsɛnee ketewa, na yɛde yɛ dwumadie no yɛ kama.

howWeUse.title: Sɛnea yɛde infɔ no di dwuma
howWeUse.provide: Ma dwumadie no ntena hɔ yie na yɛbɔ ho ban (akode kɔ mu, spam/abuse ahwehwɛ).
howWeUse.improve: Siesie nneɛma (nkyerɛase pa, adwumadi a ɛkɔ ntɛm).

sharing.title: Sɛnea yɛkyɛ
sharing.body: Yɛntɔn data. Yebetumi de infɔ ketewa akɔ ma nnipa anaa dwumadie a wɔboa yɛn (te sɛ push notification, analytics) wɔ ntam bɔ ahorow mu.

rights.title: Wo mmra
rights.body: Ɛwɔ he na wofi (te sɛ GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA) so nti wubetumi abisa wo data, asesa no, ama yɛapopa no, anaa agyae nneɛma bi ho. Frɛ yɛn: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Bere a yɛkora data ne banbɔ
retention.body: Yɛkora nea ehia na dwumadie no atumi adi dwuma. Yɛde banbɔ a ɛyɛ pɔtee di dwuma. Nsɛm a wɔde abɔ ho ban (E2E) yentumi mmue no.

children.title: Mmɔfra
children.body: Chatforia mmfa mmaa anaa mmɔfra a wɔwɔ mfe 13 nkyɛ (anaa sɛ wo mmara kyerɛ bɛboro saa).

changes.title: Nsakrae
changes.body: Sɛ yɛsesaa biribi a, yɛde bɛto ha na yɛasan asesa “Wɔto so a etwa toɔ” da no.

contact.title: Frɛ yɛn
contact.body: privacy@chatforia.com • [Kompin din a ɛwɔ mmara mu], [Adrɛs]

terms.title: Nhyiam Ntotoho (Terms of Service)
terms.lastUpdated: Wɔto so a etwa toɔ kɔtɔ so:

intro.body: Sɛ wode Chatforia di dwuma a, ɛkyerɛ sɛ wopene so kyerɛ sɛ wugye saa Ntotoho yi tom. Sɛ wompene so a, ɛnsɔre yɛ adwuma.

accounts.title: Akawunt
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Fa infɔ ankasa (nokware) na kora wo akode mu yie.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Woyɛ nea ɔhwɛ biribiara a ɛkɔ so wɔ wo akawunt mu so.

acceptableUse.title: Sɛnea ɛfata sɛ wɔde dwumadie di dwuma
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Mmfa biribi a ɛmmfata (abuse), mmfiri mmara so, mmfa spam, na mmnyɛ bot abusua kɔkɔɔ.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Yebetumi agyae anaa atwa wo so beretia sɛ wubu saa mmara yi so.

yourContent.title: Wo nsɛm
yourContent.body: Wo na wo nsɛm yɛ dea. Wode kwan ma yɛn sɛ yɛde betumi asan de dwumadie no ayɛ (te sɛ kɔ so, sie, nkyerɛase).

disclaimer.title: Atirimuɔden & ahuhudeɛ a yɛnnye so
disclaimer.body: Dwumadie no ba sɛ “nea ɛte saa” na yɛmma ho ntamgyina biara. Sɛ wɔmma kwan a, Chatforia nni tɛkyerɛma ho haw anaa nsɛnhweree kɛse a ɛto wo efisɛ wode yɛɛ adwuma no.

changes.title: Nsakrae
changes.body: Yebetumi asesa saa Ntotoho yi; sɛ wokɔ so de dwumadie no di dwuma akyiri a, ɛkyerɛ sɛ wugye nsakrae no tom.

contact.title: Frɛ yɛn
contact.body: support@chatforia.com • [Kompin din a ɛwɔ mmara mu], [Adrɛs]

doNotSell.title: Mfrɛ me data 'tɔn' anaaso 'kyɛ'
doNotSell.body: Chatforia nntɔn data. Nanso California nkurɔfo tumi bisa so wɔ CPRA fam. Fa boton no so na bisa.

cookies.title: Cookie Settings
cookies.body: Chatforia de cookies ketewa pɛ (te sɛ session ne security) di dwuma. Yɛmmfa adwumadi a ɛfiri afoforo (third-party ads cookies). Tumi sesa cookies wɔ wo brawsa no mu.
